an6.112:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya tayo dhamma bhavetabba.
an6.112:1.7: Assadaditthiya pahanaya aniccasanna bhavetabba, attanuditthiya pahanaya anattasanna bhavetabba, micchaditthiya pahanaya sammaditthi bhavetabba.
an6.112:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya ime tayo dhamma bhavetabba”ti.
